mapper.insert: update temp_protect set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, findDate=#{findDate}, sido=#{sido}, sigungu=#{sigungu}, place=#{place}, type=#{type}, sex=#{sex}, color=#{color}, feat=#{feat}, imagePath=#{imagePath}, phone=#{phone}, writeTime=#{writeTime} where seq=#{seq}
